title: Fix missing favicon so browser tab no longer shows default icon

requirements.text: Add the missing generated favicon image file to the frontend static assets at frontend/public/assets/generated/subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png so the browser can load the favicon instead of falling back to the default tab icon.

quotes: but why it gets defualt picture in tab??

acceptanceCriteria: A file named subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/ in the built output.
Requesting /assets/generated/subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png in the browser returns HTTP 200 (not 404).
After a hard refresh, the browser tab displays the custom favicon (not the default icon).

requirements.text: Ensure frontend/index.html references the correct favicon path and filename: /assets/generated/subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png (type image/png, sizes 32x32). Update it only if it does not exactly match the generated asset filename/path.

quotes: but why it gets defualt picture in tab??

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html contains a <link rel='icon'> (or equivalent) that points to /assets/generated/subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png with sizes='32x32' and type='image/png'.
No other favicon link in frontend/index.html overrides this reference.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor; no backend changes are needed for favicon/static assets.
nonGoals: Adding new pages or changing existing marketing-site sections/content beyond what is required to fix the favicon issue.
Introducing any backend logic for serving images (favicon must remain a frontend static asset).
